for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    my_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    your_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    max_element = max(my_list)
    max_indices = [i for (i, element) in enumerate(my_list) if element == max_element]
    result = max([your_list[i] for i in max_indices])
    index = your_list.index(result)
    print(index + 1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = max(a)
    z = a.index(x)
    y = b[a.index(x)]
    for i in range(z + 1, n):
        if a[i] == x and y < b[i]:
            y = b[i]
            z = i
    print(z + 1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = max(a)
    y = b[a.index(max(a))]
    z = a.index(max(a))
    for i in range(z + 1, n):
        if a[i] == x and y < b[i]:
            y = b[i]
            z = i
    print(z + 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = list(map(int, input().split()))
    w = []
    p = 0
    for (a, b) in zip(l, c):
        w.append((a, b, p))
        p += 1
    w.sort(key=lambda x: (x[0], x[1]), reverse=True)
    print(w[0][2] + 1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (maxa, maxb, resp) = (0, 0, 0)
    for i in range(n):
        if maxa < a[i] or (maxa == a[i] and maxb < b[i]):
            maxa = a[i]
            maxb = b[i]
            resp = i + 1
    print(resp)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    list_a = []
    x = max(a)
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] == x:
            list_a.append(b[i])
    y = max(list_a)
    print(b.index(y) + 1)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    l = int(input())
    likes = list(map(int, input().split()))
    comme = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (max_index, max_like) = (0, 0)
    comme_index = 0
    flag = False
    for i in range(l):
        if likes[i] > max_like:
            max_like = likes[i]
            max_index = i
            comme_index = i
            flag = False
        elif likes[i] == max_like:
            flag = True
            if comme[comme_index] < comme[i]:
                comme_index = i
        else:
            continue
    print(max_index + 1 if not flag else comme_index + 1)

for t in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    like = 0
    comment = 0
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] > like:
            like = a[i]
            comment = b[i]
            ans = i + 1
        elif a[i] == like and b[i] > comment:
            like = a[i]
            comment = b[i]
            ans = i + 1
    print(ans)

T = input()
for i in range(int(T)):
    N = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    B = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = []
    j = []
    c = max(A)
    h = 0
    k = 0
    for i in range(N):
        if A[i] == c:
            h = i
            l.append(h)
            k = k + 1
            h = 0
    for i in range(k):
        j.append(B[l[i]])
        p = max(j)
    for i in range(N):
        if B[i] == p:
            print(i + 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    li = list(map(int, input().split()))
    co = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ml = max(li)
    ma = []
    c = 0
    for m in range(0, n):
        if li[m] == ml:
            ma.append(co[m])
            c += 1
    if c == 1:
        p = li.index(max(li)) + 1
    else:
        p = co.index(max(ma)) + 1
    print(p)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    a = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = list(map(int, input().split()))
    maxl = 0
    maxc = 0
    for j in range(a):
        if l[j] > maxl:
            maxl = l[j]
            maxc = c[j]
            no = j + 1
        if l[j] == maxl:
            if c[j] > maxc:
                maxl = l[j]
                maxc = c[j]
                no = j + 1
    print(no)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    l = []
    m = max(a)
    for i in range(len(a)):
        if m == a[i]:
            l.append(b[i])
            c = c + 1
    if c == 1:
        print(a.index(m) + 1)
    else:
        n = max(l)
        print(b.index(n) + 1)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    B = list(map(int, input().split()))
    max_likes = max(A)
    ans = 0
    max_com = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if A[i] == max_likes:
            if max_com < B[i]:
                max_com = B[i]
                ans = i + 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    j = 1
    likes = a[0]
    comments = b[0]
    while j < n:
        if a[j] == likes:
            if b[j] > comments:
                comments = b[j]
        elif a[j] > likes:
            likes = a[j]
            comments = b[j]
        j += 1
    print(b.index(comments) + 1)

            max_l = a[i]
            max_c = b[i]
            output = i + 1
        elif a[i] == max_l and b[i] > max_c:
            max_l = a[i]
            max_c = b[i]
            output = i + 1
    print(output)

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l2 = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = 0
    mc = 0
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if l[i] > m:
            m = l[i]
            mc = l2[i]
            ans = i + 1
        elif l[i] == m and l2[i] > mc:
            m = l[i]
            mc = l2[i]
            ans = i + 1
    print(ans)

import numpy as g
for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))[:n]
    b = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))[:n]
    c = 0
    a1 = g.array(a)
    maxind = g.where(a1 == max(a))
    c = len(maxind[0])
    if c == 1:
        print(a.index(max(a)) + 1)
    else:
        p = [b[k] for k in maxind[0]]
        print(b.index(max(p)) + 1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    lst = list(map(int, input().split()))
    com = list(map(int, input().split()))
    maxx = max(lst)
    temp = []
    flag = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if lst[i] == maxx:
            flag += 1
            temp.append(com[i])
    if flag != 1:
        ans = com.index(max(temp))
        print(ans + 1)
    else:
        print(lst.index(max(lst)) + 1)
